Class TDCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • backbone.TDCanvas
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ardor3d.framework.Scene, com.ardor3d.framework.Updater, java.lang.Runnable

    public class TDCanvas
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, com.ardor3d.framework.Updater, com.ardor3d.framework.Scene
    The Class for updating all geometry and links to all native methods/classes
